alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Carroll; Greene; Guthrie; Webster (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 23 at 5:48PM CDT until April 23 at 6:15PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM CDT FOR GREENE...WESTERN WEBSTER...WESTERN GUTHRIE...EASTERN CALHOUN AND SOUTHEASTERN CARROLL COUNTIES... At 548 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Fort Dodge to near Guthrie Center, moving northeast at 70 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Fort Dodge, Jefferson, Guthrie Center, Coon Rapids, Gowrie, Fort Dodge Regional Airport, Lake Panorama, Badger, Scranton, Bayard, Churdan, Callender, Farnhamville, Lohrville, Bagley, Barnum, Moorland, Somers, Ralston and Knierim. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Intense thunderstorm lines can produce brief tornadoes and widespread significant wind damage. Although a tornado is not immediately likely, it is best to move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. These storms may cause serious injury and significant property damage.
